dimension_explanations.alignment: With an alignment score of 20/50, the organization serves a specific religious and cultural niche for the Bosniak community [1]. While it holds 9.2 months of working capital, there is a lack of external data to verify specific cost-per-beneficiary metrics [2].

impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: The organization operates on the premise that providing financial support and capacity building to local Islamic centers will strengthen the religious and cultural life of the Bosniak community.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence of impact would help donors understand how their contributions translate into improved community services or increased mosque attendance.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: With a <cite id="2">42.2% revenue growth rate</cite> and a mission to support all Bosniak mosques in North America, the organization has significant capacity to absorb more capital.

strengths.detail: The organization directs <cite id="1">97.6% of its total expenses</cite> toward its programs, ensuring that donor contributions are utilized almost entirely for direct support of Islamic centers.
The charity operates with <cite id="1">zero fundraising costs</cite>, meaning every dollar donated goes toward the mission rather than marketing or solicitation expenses.
The organization has achieved a <cite id="2">3-year revenue CAGR of 42.2%</cite>, indicating a rapidly expanding donor base and increasing capacity to fund initiatives.

strengths_deep_dive: The organization's financial health is bolstered by its <cite id="1">97.9% program expense ratio</cite>, which significantly exceeds the <cite id="1">peer program ratio median of 81.7%</cite> for religious and cultural organizations. This efficiency is paired with a <cite id="1">working capital ratio of 12.7 months</cite> of operating expenses, suggesting a high degree of financial resilience. Furthermore, the organization maintains a <cite id="1">100% independent board</cite>, which provides essential oversight for its <cite id="2">$4.5 million in annual contributions</cite>.
rich_narrative.summary: Islamska Zajednica Bosnjaka Sjeverne Amerike serves as a critical financial and administrative backbone for Bosniak Islamic centers across the United States and Canada. The organization's primary mission is <cite id="1">fundraising for charitable purposes and key initiatives</cite> that support the operational sustainability of these religious and cultural hubs. In the 2023 fiscal year, the charity demonstrated significant growth, reporting <cite id="2">total revenue of $4,520,145</cite>. A defining characteristic of its financial model is its extreme leaness; the organization maintains <cite id="1">exceptional fundraising efficiency</cite>, spending <cite id="1">$0.00 to raise every dollar</cite> in contributions. This allows the vast majority of incoming funds to be channeled directly into its core mission of capacity building for North American Bosniak mosques. Furthermore, the organization exhibits <cite id="2">strong liquidity with 9.2 months of working capital</cite>, providing a stable financial cushion for its ongoing support of religious infrastructure.
